sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { Check, X, ArrowRight } from "lucide-react"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; import { loadStripe } from "@stripe/stripe-js"; import { toast } from "sonner"; const BACKEND_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL; const API = `${BACKEND_URL}`; const LandingPage = () => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(null); const handleCheckout = async (planType) => { setLoading(planType); try { const normalizedPlan = planType === "yearly" ? "annual" : planType; // monthly ou lifetime const response = await fetch(`${API}/pay/vip-payment`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ planType: normalizedPlan, }), }); const data = await response.json().catch(() => null); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error(data?.error || "Failed to create checkout session"); } if (!data?.url) { throw new Error("Checkout URL não retornada pelo servidor."); } window.location.href = data.url; } catch (error) { console.error("Checkout error:", error); toast.error(error.message || "Failed to initiate checkout."); } finally { setLoading(null); } }; return (
{/* Header */}
SevenX Media
Pricing Home
{/* Hero Section */}
Premium Ad-Free Experience

Support SevenX and
browse without distractions

Upgrade your account to remove third-party ads, unlock faster browsing speeds, and support our independent content creators.

{/* Comparison Section */}

Free User

  • Standard loading speed
  • Contains Banner Ads
  • Standard Support

Premium User

  • 0% Ads (Ad-free)
  • 2x Faster Loading
  • Priority Discord Role
{/* Pricing Section */}

Choose Your Plan

Select the perfect plan for your needs

{/* Monthly Plan */}

Monthly Pass

$12 /mo
  • Remove all Website Ads
  • Support independent journalism
  • Premium "Supporter" Badge
  • Automated Activation
{/* Yearly Plan */}
Popular

Yearly Access

$80 /year

Save 45% vs Monthly

  • Everything in Monthly
  • Save 45% vs Monthly
  • Exclusive Discord Channel
  • Early Access to New Articles
{/* Lifetime Plan */}

Lifetime Founder

$199.99
  • One-time Payment
  • Never see ads again forever
  • Gold "Founder" Profile Badge
  • Direct Dev Support
{/* Footer */}

© 2024-2025 SevenX Media. All rights reserved.

Terms of Service Privacy Policy Refund Policy
); }; export default LandingPage;
